https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f9uPuv34QQwRzme8xT7cCPefv34.jpg Four days of shooting and more than 6,000 Post-it notes later, the story of a young man's angst about a deadline plays out in vivid scenes of monsters, thunderstorms and a submarine. Deadline (Post-It Stop-Motion)
